title: Women in DeFi Fireside Chat. How to Bring Women into DeFi
description: In this episode, we chat with Zia Word (Co-Founder of Matter Block) and Anna Vladi (Co-Founder at Metl) and talk about Women in DeFi.
dc:creator: Lisa JY Tan
itunes:summary: In this episode, we chat with Zia Word (Co-Founder of Matter Block) and Anna Vladi (Co-Founder at Metl) and talk about Women in DeFi.
